mapper.sql: record_id, share_id, type, patient_id, patient_teleno, patient_name, patient_age, patient_sex, doctor_id, doctor_name, doctor_teleno, doctor_avatar, hospital_id, hospital_name, department_id, department_name, medical_cover, patient_no, admission_no, bed_no, record_no, medical_date, medical_conclusion, medical_pictures, medical_video, medical_code, eye_left_vision, eye_right_vision, eye_left_img, eye_right_img, eye_left_video, eye_right_video, report_status, client_type, create_by, remarks, is_enterprise, is_remote, is_base, is_deleted
mapper.select: SELECT r.medical_conclusion,r.report_status,r.share_id,r.record_id,r.patient_id,r.doctor_id,r.medical_pictures,r.medical_video,r.type,r.medical_cover,r.medical_date,r.is_deleted,r.doctor_name,r.doctor_teleno,r.doctor_avatar,r.hospital_id,r.hospital_name, r.eye_left_img,r.eye_left_video,r.eye_left_vision,r.eye_right_img,r.eye_right_video,r.eye_right_vision,##眼睛数据 p.patient_name,p.patient_sex,p.patient_birthday,p.patient_teleno,p.patient_avatar,p.create_by c_d_id,p.patient_status,p.regist_time, d.doctor_name c_d_name,d.hospital_id c_h_id, h.hospital_name c_h_name, r.department_id, r.department_name, r.patient_teleno rpt,r.patient_name rpn,r.patient_age rpa,r.patient_sex rps, c3.city_code c3_id,c3.city_name c3_name, c2.city_code c2_id,c2.city_name c2_name, c1.city_code c1_id,c1.city_name c1_name from t_medical_record r LEFT JOIN basic_dev.t_patient p ON r.patient_id = p.patient_id LEFT JOIN basic_dev.t_doctor d ON p.create_by = d.doctor_id LEFT JOIN basic_dev.t_hospital h ON d.hospital_id = h.hospital_id LEFT JOIN basic_dev.t_city c3 ON p.city_id = c3.city_id LEFT JOIN basic_dev.t_city c2 ON c3.city_parent_code = c2.city_code LEFT JOIN basic_dev.t_city c1 ON c2.city_parent_code = c1.city_code

SELECT r.medical_conclusion,r.report_status,r.share_id,r.record_id,r.patient_id,r.doctor_id,r.medical_pictures,r.medical_video,r.type,r.medical_cover,r.medical_date,r.is_deleted,r.doctor_name,r.doctor_teleno,r.doctor_avatar,r.hospital_id,r.hospital_name, r.eye_left_img,r.eye_left_video,r.eye_left_vision,r.eye_right_img,r.eye_right_video,r.eye_right_vision,##眼睛数据 p.patient_name,p.patient_sex,p.patient_birthday,p.patient_teleno,p.patient_avatar,p.create_by c_d_id,p.patient_status,p.regist_time, d.doctor_name c_d_name,d.hospital_id c_h_id, h.hospital_name c_h_name, r.department_id, r.department_name, r.patient_teleno rpt,r.patient_name rpn,r.patient_age rpa,r.patient_sex rps, c3.city_code c3_id,c3.city_name c3_name, c2.city_code c2_id,c2.city_name c2_name, c1.city_code c1_id,c1.city_name c1_name from t_medical_record r LEFT JOIN basic_test.t_patient p ON r.patient_id = p.patient_id LEFT JOIN basic_test.t_doctor d ON p.create_by = d.doctor_id LEFT JOIN basic_test.t_hospital h ON d.hospital_id = h.hospital_id LEFT JOIN basic_test.t_city c3 ON p.city_id = c3.city_id LEFT JOIN basic_test.t_city c2 ON c3.city_parent_code = c2.city_code LEFT JOIN basic_test.t_city c1 ON c2.city_parent_code = c1.city_code

SELECT r.medical_conclusion,r.report_status,r.share_id,r.record_id,r.patient_id,r.doctor_id,r.medical_pictures,r.medical_video,r.type,r.medical_cover,r.medical_date,r.is_deleted,r.doctor_name,r.doctor_teleno,r.doctor_avatar,r.hospital_id,r.hospital_name, r.eye_left_img,r.eye_left_video,r.eye_left_vision,r.eye_right_img,r.eye_right_video,r.eye_right_vision,##眼睛数据 p.patient_name,p.patient_sex,p.patient_birthday,p.patient_teleno,p.patient_avatar,p.create_by c_d_id,p.patient_status,p.regist_time, d.doctor_name c_d_name,d.hospital_id c_h_id, h.hospital_name c_h_name, r.department_id, r.department_name, r.patient_teleno rpt,r.patient_name rpn,r.patient_age rpa,r.patient_sex rps, c3.city_code c3_id,c3.city_name c3_name, c2.city_code c2_id,c2.city_name c2_name, c1.city_code c1_id,c1.city_name c1_name from t_medical_record r LEFT JOIN basic_pro.t_patient p ON r.patient_id = p.patient_id LEFT JOIN basic_pro.t_doctor d ON p.create_by = d.doctor_id LEFT JOIN basic_pro.t_hospital h ON d.hospital_id = h.hospital_id LEFT JOIN basic_pro.t_city c3 ON p.city_id = c3.city_id LEFT JOIN basic_pro.t_city c2 ON c3.city_parent_code = c2.city_code LEFT JOIN basic_pro.t_city c1 ON c2.city_parent_code = c1.city_code

mapper.update:
update t_medical_record
share_id = #{shareId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER},
patient_id = #{patientId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
patient_teleno = #{patientTeleno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
patient_name = #{patientName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
patient_age = #{patientAge,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
patient_sex = #{patientSex,jdbcType=INTEGER},
doctor_id = #{doctorId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
doctor_name = #{doctorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
doctor_teleno = #{doctorTeleno,jdbcType=CHAR},
doctor_avatar = #{doctorAvatar,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
hospital_id = #{hospitalId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
hospital_name = #{hospitalName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
department_id = #{departmentId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
department_name = #{departmentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
medical_cover = #{medicalCover,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
patient_no = #{patientNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
admission_no = #{admissionNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bed_no = #{bedNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
record_no = #{recordNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
medical_date = #{medicalDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
medical_conclusion = #{medicalConclusion,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
medical_pictures = #{medicalPictures,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
medical_video = #{medicalVideo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
medical_code = #{medicalCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
eye_left_vision = #{eyeLeftVision,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
eye_right_vision = #{eyeRightVision,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
eye_left_img = #{eyeLeftImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
eye_right_img = #{eyeRightImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
eye_left_video = #{eyeLeftVideo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
eye_right_video = #{eyeRightVideo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
report_status = #{reportStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
client_type = #{clientType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=INTEGER},
remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_enterprise = #{isEnterprise,jdbcType=INTEGER},
is_remote = #{isRemote,jdbcType=INTEGER},
is_base = #{isBase,jdbcType=INTEGER},
is_deleted = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where record_id = #{recordId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_medical_record set share_id = #{shareId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, patient_id = #{patientId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, patient_teleno = #{patientTeleno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, patient_name = #{patientName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, patient_age = #{patientAge,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, patient_sex = #{patientSex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, doctor_id = #{doctorId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, doctor_name = #{doctorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, doctor_teleno = #{doctorTeleno,jdbcType=CHAR}, doctor_avatar = #{doctorAvatar,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, hospital_id = #{hospitalId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, hospital_name = #{hospitalName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, department_id = #{departmentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, department_name = #{departmentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, medical_cover = #{medicalCover,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, patient_no = #{patientNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, admission_no = #{admissionNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bed_no = #{bedNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, record_no = #{recordNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, medical_date = #{medicalDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, medical_conclusion = #{medicalConclusion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, medical_pictures = #{medicalPictures,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, medical_video = #{medicalVideo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, medical_code = #{medicalCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, eye_left_vision = #{eyeLeftVision,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, eye_right_vision = #{eyeRightVision,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, eye_left_img = #{eyeLeftImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, eye_right_img = #{eyeRightImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, eye_left_video = #{eyeLeftVideo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, eye_right_video = #{eyeRightVideo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, report_status = #{reportStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, client_type = #{clientType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_enterprise = #{isEnterprise,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_remote = #{isRemote,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_base = #{isBase,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_deleted = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER} where record_id = #{recordId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
